title: ps34
author: ps34
content: Hello i need 500 € loan   have iphone 14 pro max collateral contact me

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Is it the same one TheCryptoMom have?

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 07:32:56 PMHello i need 500 € loan   have iphone 14 pro max collateral contact meSo why don't you go ahead and pawn or sell that iPhone you've got? Quit with the whole "asking for a loan" charade. It didn't work for you last year, it won't work now either.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 07:32:56 PMHello i need 500 € loan   have iphone 14 pro max collateral contact meSell the phone! Buy it again when you will have money in pocket. You don't need luxury while your pocket is empty.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on July 07, 2023, 07:54:18 PMSo why don't youQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 07, 2023, 08:00:51 PMSell the phone!Because that won't earn him any positive trust on Bitcointalk!  How is he supposed to work up the ability to pull a high-dollar exit scam without green trust?  You guys are really low IQ apes...  Oops, sorry wrong alt account.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 07, 2023, 08:10:26 PMQuote from: FatFork on July 07, 2023, 07:54:18 PMSo why don't youQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 07, 2023, 08:00:51 PMSell the phone!Because that won't earn him any positive trust on Bitcointalk!  How is he supposed to work up the ability to pull a high-dollar exit scam without green trust?  You guys are really low IQ apes...  Oops, sorry wrong alt account.  what about the alt I mentioned   TheCryptoMom

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 07, 2023, 08:00:51 PMQuote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 07:32:56 PMHello i need 500 € loan   have iphone 14 pro max collateral contact meSell the phone! Buy it again when you will have money in pocket. You don't need luxury while your pocket is empty. exactly, I don't know why people like to use big phone when they are not working, and no food to eat. They can't use the phone to make money online yet they busy using big phones and still eatinf from their parents pots. I support you. He should sell the phone instead of using it as collateral.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: how about you not judge the person needing a loan okay ? can we agree on that  at least?i don't want to sell my phone  want to keep it  that's my personal reason  and no i don't have alts here like i said  before how about you contact me and i show me my phone

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 08:33:30 PMhow about you not judge the person needing a loan okay ? can we agree on that  at least?You mean like the way you've been judging HedgeFx for weeks, or the way you used to judge mnightwaffles before that?Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 08:33:30 PMi don't want to sell my phone  want to keep it  that's my personal reasonAnd let me guess; "proof" that you have the phone is the "collateral" you're offering, right?  You have no intention of sending the phone to the lender or an escrow agent?Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 08:33:30 PMand no i don't have alts here like i said  beforeThat is a lie, and anyone with half a brain can see that.Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 08:33:30 PMhow about you contact me and i show me my phone   I don't need to contact you to see photos of an iPhone, they're all over the internet.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: if your smart direwolfm14 and i believe you are sir then i show with webcam and not a picture from the internet   for anyone intrestedif i have alts  contact moderators then and let them find out i'm curious   you will find ZERO alts   this is my only account but i don't care  to proof myself to you about this alts thing  i know what is the truth and that's more then enough for me

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 09:12:06 PMthen i show with webcam and not a picture from the internetThat's still not collateral!  Why didn't you answer my question about whether you're willing to send it to the lender or escrow agent?

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: if this grant me a loan 500 €  yeah sure why wouldn't i send it to the lender  but then i need to know i'm getting it back  also   and that's a risk for me  but if it's maybe a very trusted person here on forum that's something i can do yes

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 09:17:53 PMif this grant me a loan 500 €  yeah sure why wouldn't i send it to the lender  but then i need to know i'm getting it back  also   and that's a risk for me  but if it's maybe a very trusted person here on forum that's something i can do yesWhat country will you be sending it from? Icloud removal etc?

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: netherlands  but like i say if your intrested contact me with your contact details so we can talk more easier en om te bewijzen dat ik in nederland woon  zal ik hier een zin schrijven in het nederlands

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 09:17:53 PMif this grant me a loan 500 €  yeah sure why wouldn't i send it to the lender  but then i need to know i'm getting it back  also   and that's a risk for me  but if it's maybe a very trusted person here on forum that's something i can do yesFinally!  After of year of jerking around, you've actually offered something real as collateral.Now the next question:  If you've been asking for this loan for more than a year, how are you going to convince the lender you have the ability to pay back the loan?  When do you plan to recover from needing €500?

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: i have a monthly wage   i get   so i can pay back from my wage    and i can send you the wage documents  if needed

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 09:30:45 PMi have a monthly wage   i get   so i can pay back from my wage    and i can send you the wage documents  if needed Then why do you still need this loan after a year?En om te bewijzen dat iedereen met google een zin in het Nederlands kan vertalen...

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: kerel denk je nu werkelijk dat ik google nodig heb om nederlands te praten praat jij zelf nederlands mss ?   jij  leuke engelsman jij

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: Ik ken het verschil tussen moedertaal en het gebruik van vertalers.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on July 07, 2023, 09:30:45 PMi have a monthly wage   i get   so i can pay back from my wage    and i can send you the wage documents  if needed In that case, instead of seeking a loan, why not take matters into your own hands and build up your savings?Think about it. By stashing away a portion of monthly wage, you could easily save up that $500 in the year and a half that you've been begging for a loan here. We're talking about less than $30 a month here. Seriously, can you honestly tell me that setting aside such a small, insignificant amount each month is beyond your reach?
